# init(xpcService:targetQueue:options:requirement:cancellationHandler:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new session object representing a connection to the named service, and requires that the session peer has the specified requirement.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency convenience init(xpcService: String, targetQueue: DispatchQueue? = nil, options: XPCSession.InitializationOptions = .none, requirement: XPCPeerRequirement, cancellationHandler: ((XPCRichError) -> Void)? = nil) throws
```

## Discussion

- requirement: The requirement the peer must have
title: init(xpcService:targetQueue:options:requirement:cancellationHandler:)
